a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average weekly working hours of children
Average weekly working hours for children ages 7-14 who are involved in an economic activity for at least one
hour in the reference week of the corresponding survey (irrespective of school attendance).
Data source: International Labour Organization, UNICEF, and World Bank (2025)
